description:
Sunny Peace and Moon Tempest are up against each other in the finals. http://anidb.net/ch111713 [Mana] confesses her true regret and feelings to http://anidb.net/ch114695 [Kouhei] before her final goodbye.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: The Story That Begins with Goodbye
サヨナラから始まる物語
